# harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key (Resource)

Resource for managing GPG Signing Keys for Terraform/OpenTofu Providers in the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key" "example" {
  key_id      = "51852D87348FFC4C"
  key_name    = "HashiCorp Security"
  user        = "security@hashicorp.com"
  ascii_armor = <<-EOT
-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----

mQINBGB9+xkBEACabYZOWKmgZsHTdRDiyPJxhbuUiKX65GUWkyRMJKi/1dviVxOX

QIp3/Bh09kET6lk+4QlofNgHKVT2epV8iK1cXlbQe2tZtfCUtxk+pxvU0UHXp+AB
0xc3/gIhjZp/dePmCOyQyGPJbp5bpO4UeAJ6frqhexmNlaw9Z897ltZmRLGq1p4a

}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ascii_armor` (String, Sensitive) ASCII-armored GPG public key.
- `key_id` (String) GPG key ID.
- `key_name` (String) GPG key name.
- `user` (String) User who uploaded the key.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the signing key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last updated timestamp.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import harness_platform_infra_provider_signing_key.example <signing_key_id>
```
